properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_NICK , ADDRESS , PHONE , EMAIL , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM USER1 WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO SEARCH ( S_NO , USER_NO , S_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_SEARCH.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO SEARCH ( S_NO , S_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_SEARCH.NEXTVAL , ? )

SELECT AS_CONTENT , AS_COUNT
FROM ALL_SEARCH WHERE AS_CONTENT LIKE ? ORDER BY AS_COUNT DESC
SELECT AS_CONTENT , AS_COUNT FROM (SELECT AS_CONTENT , AS_COUNT FROM ALL_SEARCH ORDER BY AS_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10
UPDATE SEARCH SET S_COUNT= S_COUNT+1 WHERE S_NAME=? AND USER_NO IS NULL
UPDATE SEARCH SET S_COUNT= S_COUNT+1 WHERE S_NAME=? AND USER_NO=?
UPDATE ALL_SEARCH SET AS_COUNT= AS_COUNT+1 WHERE AS_CONTENT=?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "RESULT" FROM USER1 WHERE USER_ID= ?
